results.subtask: What is the relationship between what in the context of the query?
results.answer: Lasso Regression achieves automatic feature selection by setting irrelevant variable coefficients to zero. It is useful in high-dimensional data such as ERA5, where most features have minimal importance. Model provides a baseline to compare against.

evidence.text:
Model provides a baseline to compare against. It 
works well if there is a linear correlation between cyclone 
intensity and meteorological parameters (e.g., wind speed, 
mean sea level). There are some drawbacks: it is unable to 
capture complex and non -linear  interactions since cyclone 
intensity is influenced by them , high multicollinearity 
between meteorological parameters impacts model stability; 
and it is outlier -sensitive. B. Lasso Regression  
       Model achieves automatic feature selection by setting 
irrelevant variable coefficients to zero, and it is useful in 
high-dimensional data such as ERA5, where most features 
can have minimal importance. It is, however, subject to some 
limitations: it deletes significant variables, resulting in an 
underfitted model or incorrect prediction, and it does not 
perform well with highly correlated features . C.
